name: Frog Frenzy (itch) (Larrypickle, CtKairos12, ahazen, JudyZhang7)
description:
Frog Frenzy is a 2D grid based game where you play as a frog who must bide his time before unleashing his FURY onto his enemies. Survive as long as possible while eliminating hordes of snakes and turtles and collecting hats to upgrade your abilities. 

Credits:

Larry Wu - Design, Programming, Art

Alexander Hazen - Design, Programming

Judy Zhang - Design, Programming, Art

Christopher Ting - Design, Programming

Background Music: https://pudretediablo.itch.io/snes-bgm-1

SFX: https://jdwasabi.itch.io/8-bit-16-bit-sound-effects-pack

Frog Sprite: https://hiroredbird.itch.io/simple-frog-sprites

CSCI 426 Game Prototyping Final
